H0.text: Sun Yat Sen overthrew the emperor in which country establishing a republic after 2000 years of imperial rule. Japan

H1.text: Sun Yat Sen overthrew the emperor in which country establishing a republic after 2000 years of imperial rule. Korea

H2.text: Sun Yat Sen overthrew the emperor in which country establishing a republic after 2000 years of imperial rule. Vietnam

H3.text: Sun Yat Sen overthrew the emperor in which country establishing a republic after 2000 years of imperial rule. 中国

A4.text: Sun Yat-sen overthrew the Qing dynasty in China, establishing the Republic of China (ROC).

A5.text: Sun Yat-sen served as the first president of the Provisional Government of the Republic of China (1912).
